name: Flanker 2.0: Combat Flight Simulator
description:
Flanker 2.0: Combat Flight Simulator is a simulation game developed by Eagle Dynamics. It came out on 30-09-1999. It was published by Mindscape Entertainment. Flanker 2.0: Combat Flight Simulator has a Metascore of 81, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Flanker 2.0: Combat Flight Simulator is available on PC.
